queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*sophos* block
| where action = "block"
| if(isBlank(categoryname), "Uncategorized", categoryname) as categoryname
| count as blocks by categoryname
| sort blocks
| limit 10

_sourcecategory=*sophos* block
| where action = "block"
| if(isBlank(error), "Unknown", error) as error
| count as blocks by error
| sort blocks
| limit 10

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "block"
| if( compareCIDRPrefix("10.0.0.0",dstip, toInt(8)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("172.16.0.0", dstip, toInt(12)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("192.168.0.0", dstip, toInt(16)), "Private", "Public") as ip_type
| where ip_type matches "Public"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=dstip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_sourcecategory=*sophos* block
| where action = "block"
| where !(isBlank(dstip))
| count by dstip | count as blocked_ips

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "block"
| count as blocks by url
| sort blocks
| limit 10

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "block"
| timeslice 1m
| count as blocks by _timeslice
| outlier blocks

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "block"
| count as blocks

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "block"
| if( compareCIDRPrefix("10.0.0.0",srcip, toInt(8)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("172.16.0.0", srcip, toInt(12)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("192.168.0.0", srcip, toInt(16)), "Private", "Public") as ip_type
| where ip_type matches "Public"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=srcip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "drop"
| timeslice 1m
| count as drops by _timeslice
| outlier drops

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "drop"
| count as drops

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "drop"
| if( compareCIDRPrefix("10.0.0.0",srcip, toInt(8)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("172.16.0.0", srcip, toInt(12)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("192.168.0.0", srcip, toInt(16)), "Private", "Public") as ip_type
| where ip_type matches "Public"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=srcip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "drop"
| count as drops by dstip
| sort drops
| limit 10

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "drop"
| count as drops by srcip
| sort drops
| limit 10

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "drop"
| if( compareCIDRPrefix("10.0.0.0",dstip, toInt(8)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("172.16.0.0", dstip, toInt(12)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("192.168.0.0", dstip, toInt(16)), "Private", "Public") as ip_type
| where ip_type matches "Public"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=dstip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "block"
| count as blocks

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "drop"
| timeslice 1m
| count as drops by _timeslice
| outlier drops

_view=threat_intel_* _sourcecategory=*sophos*
| timeslice 1m
| sum(_count) as threats by _timeslice
| fillmissing timeslice(1m)
| outlier threats

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "block"
| timeslice 1m
| count as blocks by _timeslice
| outlier blocks

_view=threat_intel_* _sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where malicious_confidence matches "high"
| sum(_count) as threats

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(action matches "drop") and !(action matches "block") and !(isBlank(action)) and !(isBlank(size))
| sum(size) as bytes 
| bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes
| fields -bytes

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(action matches "drop") and !(action matches "block") and !(isBlank(action)) and !(isBlank(size))
| timeslice 1m
| sum(size) as bytes by _timeslice
| bytes / 1024 / 1024 as mbytes
| outlier mbytes

_sourcecategory=*sophos* 
| where action = "drop"
| count as drops

_view=threat_intel_ip_address _sourcecategory=*sophos*
| sum(_count) as threats by ip_address
| sort threats
| limit 20

panels.title: Overview of threat detection logs from Sophos

queries.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain _sourcecategory=*sophos*
| sum(_count) as threats by domain
| sort threats
| limit 20

_view=threat_intel_* _sourcecategory=*sophos*
| timeslice 15m
| sum(_count) as threats by _timeslice
| outlier threats

_view=threat_intel_* _sourcecategory=*sophos*
| "other" as ioc
| if(!isBlank(ip_address), "ip", ioc) as ioc
| if(!isBlank(url), "url", ioc) as ioc
| if(!isBlank(domain), "domain", ioc) as ioc
| if(!isBlank(email_address), "email_address", ioc) as ioc
| if(!isBlank(file_name), "file_name", ioc) as ioc
| if(!isBlank(hash_256), "hash_256", ioc) as ioc
| timeslice 30m
| count as threats by ioc, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column ioc

panels.title: Sumo Logic's Integrated Threat Intelligence from CrowdStrike

queries.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_* _sourcecategory=*sophos*
| sum(_count) as threats by malicious_confidence
| sort threats

_view=threat_intel_url _sourcecategory=*sophos*
| sum(_count) as threats by url
| sort threats
| limit 20

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(isBlank(reputation)) and reputation matches "malicious" and action matches "block"
| count as blocks

_view=threat_intel_ip_address _sourcecategory=*sophos*
| if(isBlank(ip_address_types), "unknown", ip_address_types) as ip_address_types
| sum(_count) as threats by ip_address_types
| sort threats

panels.title: Malicious Traffic by Category and Action

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(isBlank(reputation)) and reputation matches "malicious"
| count as malicious_traffic by categoryname, action
| sort malicious_traffic

_view=threat_intel_* _sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where malicious_confidence matches "high"
| sum(_count) as threats

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| timeslice 30m
| avg(avscantime) as avscantime by _timeslice
| outlier avscantime

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(action matches "drop") and !(action matches "block") and !(isBlank(action)) and !(isBlank(referer))
| parse regex field=referer "\/\/(?<referer_domain>[^\/]+)\/?"
| sum(size) as bytes by referer_domain
| sort bytes
| bytes / 1024 / 1024 as mbytes
| fields -bytes
| limit 10

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(action matches "drop") and !(action matches "block") and !(isBlank(action)) and !(isBlank(size))
| timeslice 1m
| sum(size) as bytes by _timeslice, sys, sub
| bytes / 1024 / 1024 as mbytes
| fields -bytes
| transpose row _timeslice column sys, sub

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(action matches "drop") and !(action matches "block") and !(isBlank(action)) and !(isBlank(size))
| sum(size) as bytes by url
| sort bytes
| bytes / 1024 / 1024 as mbytes
| fields -bytes
| limit 10

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(action matches "drop") and !(action matches "block") and !(isBlank(action)) and !(isBlank(size))
| sum(size) as bytes 
| bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes
| fields -bytes

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(action matches "drop") and !(action matches "block") and !(isBlank(action)) and !(isBlank(size))
| if(isBlank(categoryname), "none", categoryname) as categoryname
| sum(size) as bytes by categoryname
| bytes / 1024 / 1024 as mbytes
| sort mbytes
| limit 10

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(action matches "drop") and !(action matches "block")
| if( compareCIDRPrefix("10.0.0.0",srcip, toInt(8)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("172.16.0.0", srcip, toInt(12)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("192.168.0.0", srcip, toInt(16)), "Private", "Public") as ip_type
| where ip_type matches "Public"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=srcip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(action matches "drop") and !(action matches "block") and !(isBlank(action)) and !(isBlank(size))
| timeslice 5m
| count(*) as count, sum(size) as bytes by _timeslice
| bytes / 1024 / 1024 as mbytes
| fields -bytes

_sourcecategory=*sophos*
| where !(action matches "drop") and !(action matches "block")
| if( compareCIDRPrefix("10.0.0.0",dstip, toInt(8)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("172.16.0.0", dstip, toInt(12)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("192.168.0.0", dstip, toInt(16)), "Private", "Public") as ip_type
| where ip_type matches "Public"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=dstip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count
